snippet.title: Math World VR | Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Math World VR combines fun games with simple math to exercise the brain!

This STEM Accredited VR game consists of 12 fun mini-games for all ages to enjoy! Who said brain exercise can't be fun?

Axe Throwing | Bow & Arrow | Basketball Free Throw | Punch The Plates | Number Slicer | Baseball Throw | Target Marksman | Carnival Darts | Frisbee Toss | Mini-Golf | Multiples Paintball | Slingshot

Each mini game in Math World VR combines simple math that adds a fun challenge. Whether it's axe throwing, even/odds with throwing darts at balloons, or shooting a bow and arrow at the correct answer for the equation, you'll have countless hours of fun - all while helping improve your math arithmetic and exercise your brain!

Math World VR can be played stationary.
-

Purchase Math World VR Today:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4923914040997217/
| Available for Meta Quest, Meta Quest 2 |

-

Visit our website: https://www.SkillPrepare.com

STEM.org Accredited Education Experience Certificate & Badge: https://blockchain.stem.org/b3ee07d9-d00e-4106-8a17-ff925324c222?fbclid=IwAR0PSjMDP7S-AKOKQijP43LGO_lUr8o6a6MWfvMe7ac6H5sfKSF79yibd4w#gs.dt18mm
